mapper.select: SELECT ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y1, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y3, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y5, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y1, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y3, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y5, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y1, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y3, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y5, COST_RADIO_Y1, COST_RADIO_Y3, COST_RADIO_Y5, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y1, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y3, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y5, CHECK_PROFIT_Y1, CHECK_PROFIT_Y3, CHECK_PROFIT_Y5, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y1, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y3, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y5, CASH_FLOW_Y1, CASH_FLOW_Y3, CASH_FLOW_Y5, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y1, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y3, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y5, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y1, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y3, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y5, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y1, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y3, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y5, REMARK, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 FROM T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_ROI where INVESTMENT_ID = #{investmentId} AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015' limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sf_est_investment_roi ( AUTO_NO, ROW_ID, INVESTMENT_ID, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y1, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y3, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y5, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y1, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y3, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y5, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y1, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y3, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y5, COST_RADIO_Y1, COST_RADIO_Y3, COST_RADIO_Y5, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y1, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y3, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y5, CHECK_PROFIT_Y1, CHECK_PROFIT_Y3, CHECK_PROFIT_Y5, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y1, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y3, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y5, CASH_FLOW_Y1, CASH_FLOW_Y3, CASH_FLOW_Y5, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y1, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y3, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y5, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y1, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y3, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y5, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y1, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y3, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y5, REMARK, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG, DEF1, DEF2, DEF3, DEF4, DEF5, DEF6, DEF7, DEF8, DEF9, DEF10 ) VALUES ( #{autoNo}, #{rowId}, #{investmentId}, #{salesIncludeTaxY1}, #{salesIncludeTaxY3}, #{salesIncludeTaxY5}, #{taxAdjustmentEftY1}, #{taxAdjustmentEftY3}, #{taxAdjustmentEftY5}, #{grossProfitRadioY1}, #{grossProfitRadioY3}, #{grossProfitRadioY5}, #{costRadioY1}, #{costRadioY3}, #{costRadioY5}, #{taxRentPctY1}, #{taxRentPctY3}, #{taxRentPctY5}, #{checkProfitY1}, #{checkProfitY3}, #{checkProfitY5}, #{productionProfitY1}, #{productionProfitY3}, #{productionProfitY5}, #{cashFlowY1}, #{cashFlowY3}, #{cashFlowY5}, #{rateOfReturnY1}, #{rateOfReturnY3}, #{rateOfReturnY5}, #{paybackPeriodY1}, #{paybackPeriodY3}, #{paybackPeriodY5}, #{netPresentValueY1}, #{netPresentValueY3}, #{netPresentValueY5}, #{remark}, #{creator}, sysdate(), #{updater}, sysdate(), #{delFlag}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{def6}, #{def7}, #{def8}, #{def9}, #{def10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_ROI SET INVESTMENT_ID = #{investmentId}, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y1 = #{salesIncludeTaxY1}, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y3 = #{salesIncludeTaxY3}, SALES_INCLUDE_TAX_Y5 = #{salesIncludeTaxY5}, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y1 = #{taxAdjustmentEftY1}, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y3 = #{taxAdjustmentEftY3}, TAX_ADJUSTMENT_EFT_Y5 = #{taxAdjustmentEftY5}, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y1 = #{grossProfitRadioY1}, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y3 = #{grossProfitRadioY3}, GROSS_PROFIT_RADIO_Y5 = #{grossProfitRadioY5}, COST_RADIO_Y1 = #{costRadioY1}, COST_RADIO_Y3 = #{costRadioY3}, COST_RADIO_Y5 = #{costRadioY5}, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y1 = #{taxRentPctY1}, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y3 = #{taxRentPctY3}, TAX_RENT_PCT_Y5 = #{taxRentPctY5}, CHECK_PROFIT_Y1 = #{checkProfitY1}, CHECK_PROFIT_Y3 = #{checkProfitY3}, CHECK_PROFIT_Y5 = #{checkProfitY5}, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y1 = #{productionProfitY1}, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y3 = #{productionProfitY3}, PRODUCTION_PROFIT_Y5 = #{productionProfitY5}, CASH_FLOW_Y1 = #{cashFlowY1}, CASH_FLOW_Y3 = #{cashFlowY3}, CASH_FLOW_Y5 = #{cashFlowY5}, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y1 = #{rateOfReturnY1}, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y3 = #{rateOfReturnY3}, RATE_OF_RETURN_Y5 = #{rateOfReturnY5}, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y1 = #{paybackPeriodY1}, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y3 = #{paybackPeriodY3}, PAYBACK_PERIOD_Y5 = #{paybackPeriodY5}, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y1 = #{netPresentValueY1}, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y3 = #{netPresentValueY3}, NET_PRESENT_VALUE_Y5 = #{netPresentValueY5}, REMARK = #{remark}, UPDATER = #{updater}, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate(), DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag}, DEF1 = #{def1}, DEF2 = #{def2}, DEF3 = #{def3}, DEF4 = #{def4}, DEF5 = #{def5}, DEF6 = #{def6}, DEF7 = #{def7}, DEF8 = #{def8}, DEF9 = #{def9}, DEF10 = #{def10} WHERE ROW_ID = #{rowId}
UPDATE T_SF_EST_INVESTMENT_ROI SET DEL_FLAG = 'M0014' WHERE INVESTMENT_ID = #{investmentId}
